definition: bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
five crops, e.g. millet 粟[su4], soybean 豆[dou4], sesame 麻[ma2], barley 麥|麦[mai4], rice 稻[dao4] or other variants/all crops/all grains/oats, peas, beans and barley
Guyu or Grain Rain, 6th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th April-4th May
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
ear of grain/gerbe (used on coats of arms)

sentences.english: I'll boil the grain and make soup.
The number of pigs a family can keep is limited, for pigs consume grain.
sentences.chinese: 限制每家餵豬的數目，因爲豬喫去穀米。

sentences.english: The U-shape of some glacial valleys may be due also to deposition.
sentences.chinese: 某些U型冰川穀也可能起因於沉積作用。

sentences.english: Typical main city mode was still plain-valley-city in northern Shaanxi's Loess Hill and Gully Area.
sentences.chinese: 川穀型城鎮仍然是陝北黃土丘陵溝壑區的主要類型。

sentences.english: After the valley of the old lady installed dizzy returned to the house, by the valley.
sentences.chinese: 而谷老夫人裝暈之後回到屋裏，被穀風拆穿。

sentences.english: Do we really need 13 different varieties of Cheerios?
sentences.chinese: 我們真的需要13種口味的脆穀樂嗎？

sentences.english: Is there where rivers merge into oceans.
How far is Cool Canyon Nature Spot?
sentences.chinese: 請問，清涼穀風景區離這裏還有多遠？

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a novel combined thresher, which is mainly suitable for harvestry in a farm.
sentences.chinese: 一種新型組合式脫穀機，主要適用於田間收割。

sentences.english: V-belt drive of multi-driven pulleys is widely used in combine.
sentences.chinese: 多從動輪三角帶傳動廣泛用於聯合收穫機和脫穀機上。

sentences.english: How long does get to Peach Canyon Spot?
sentences.chinese: 請問，到桃源仙穀風景區還需要多長時間？

sentences.english: Grain Rain is one of the 24 solar terms.
sentences.chinese: 穀雨是二十四節氣之一。

sentences.english: When because this is of Grain Rain season, undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是穀雨時節的正在進行時。

sentences.english: What problem do we have when Grain Rain comes?
sentences.chinese: 穀雨到來時常常會有什麼問題？

sentences.english: It originated from the ancient saying that "rain gives life to all grains".
sentences.chinese: 穀雨源自古人“雨生百穀”之說。

sentences.english: It originated from the ancient saying that "rain gives life to all grains".
sentences.chinese: 穀雨源自古人“雨生百穀”之說。

definition: five crops, e.g. millet 粟[su4], soybean 豆[dou4], sesame 麻[ma2], barley 麥|麦[mai4], rice 稻[dao4] or other variants/all crops/all grains/oats, peas, beans and barley
all the grains/every kind of cereal crop
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
lit. mythical bird Jingwei tries to fill the ocean with stones (idiom); futile ambition/task of Sisyphus/determination in the face of impossible odds
